content: sunset hat by emily dormier materials 4 different colors of worsted weight yarn 50 yards of each color size us 8/5 0 mm 16 inch circular needle size us 8/5 0 mm double pointed needles tapestry needle gauge 18 stitches and 20 row = 4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k - knit first color p - purl k2tog - knit two together second color cast on 88 stitches on circular needle third color rnds 1-8 worked in color a *k2 p2* repeat fourth color until end of round row 9-33 work from chart remaining row worked in fourth color round 34 *k6 k2tog* repeat until end of round round 35 knit across round 36 *k5 k2tog* repeat until end of round transfer onto double pointed needles round 37 knit across round 38 *k4 k2tog* repeat until end of round round 39 knit across round 40 *k3 k2tog* repeat until end of round round 41 knit across round 42 *k2 k2tog* repeat until end of round round 43 knit across round 44 *k1 k2tog*repeat until end of round round 45 knit across round 46 *k2tog* repeat until end of round round 47 *k2tog k1* repeat until end of round cut yarn and pull through remaining loops weave in ends
